name: INSTAbond® 108 Grade R
description: INSTAbond® 108 Grade R is a medium strength, wicking grade anaerobic thread locking compound used to secure preassembled bolts up to ½” in diameter. Penetrates threaded assemblies by capillary action and secures set screws and other assemblies after settings are complete. Protects threaded assemblies from rust and corrosion. Heat is required for removal with hand tools.
